website_summaries.verdict: A stylish and functional addition to your nursery. These storage baskets easily stack together when not in use. Strong and sturdy cotton rope design.
pros: Strong and durable cotton rope built baskets are ideal for quickly storing away clutter and toys
Easy to access when it is playtime
Will complement traditional and contemporary decor alike
cons: Some users say these are smaller than they had expected

customer_reviews.title: Great little baskets!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 month old loves these little baskets! They’re soft yet they hold their shape well and she’s able to tip them over and pull toys out. They’ve been a big hit for us, so far! And they allow us to organize the toys in her playroom a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: nice woven storage baskets!!
customer_reviews.text: very cute storage baskets! exactly what i was looking for... very sturdy and well made! im ordering more of other sizes.. wish i could purchase each basket individually because i only need a certain size basket for other purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me but good product
customer_reviews.text: It is very thick and sturdy, but it is too heavy for me to use—because I wanted to use them as a toy basket and it doesn’t hold as much considering how heavy it is. I’m not saying it’s so heavy that I can’t lift it, it’s more like the basket itself weighs more than the toys I want to keep in them. But I am keeping them just in case I can use them somewhere else—and if I find the perfect things to store, I’ll update my review. I’m giving 2 stars just because it wasn’t something I didn’t expect—but if you’re looking for something sturdy and thick, this is great one.
customer_reviews.author: June3527

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought they would be but they hold there shape.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Just love these baskets!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a third set because I keep finding uses for them. I love how pliable they are so I can stuff them into spots where a rigid basket would not work. Just overall useful and well made. I have some health issues so I have a lot of medications I take. The small baskets are perfect for holding my myriad of pill bottles and other first aid items I need. One thing though. Would like to see color options. 👍🏻😁
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just as described. Beautiful baskets and very well made. Asked whether I needed to wash them first due to chemicals and I got an immediate reply that there were no chemicals and safe if they got chewed on. I purchased this product to use for my cats toys and was very happy that they are so pretty and safe for her if she chews on them. Very thick but will collapse for her to reach in and grab a toy but sturdy enough for other uses. Thanks for making such a safe and beautiful product.Would be great for babies toys.
customer_reviews.author: Dee of Wesley Chapel

customer_reviews.title: They're good for rolled towels in the bathroom or any counter ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest baskets ever. They're good for rolled towels in the bathroom or any counter top where you typically have a lot of junk and want to clean up the look. I love how soft they are and the little handles on the side are great for picking them up and carrying things. I also like that they're shallow enough to fit under cabinets but not too shallow where they don't hold anything. would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice design
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these baskets is terrific. They are sturdy and do not lose their shape in daily use. I use them for random lightweight objects around the house like washcloths and cat toys. The texture is a nice design element. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Bunny

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHITE very SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Cute, very small and NOT WHITE this is an off white, disappointed with the color, and size, but will find some use for them they are well made. But if you are looking for WHITE baskets and need these for storage don’t waste your time as nothing really fits in these, and they are not the color they say they are.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ricardoson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. They hide little bits of clutter and look great. They are not stiff so if that is what you need these are not for you. They are a very nice addition to the decor in the room and work perfect on a shelf. -V.F.
customer_reviews.author: Russell F.

customer_reviews.title: Great nursery buy!
customer_reviews.text: So cute for our baby's nursery! We have the Jameson changing table from RH and these baskets fit very nicely, with room for a wipe holder and a few other knick knacks. The large basket is great to hold diapers and the other small baskets are being used to hold diaper cream, powder, pacifiers There are "similar" ones at PB Kids which were two and a half times the cost of these. So glad we purchased them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for such a low price. They arrived clean and in perfect condition. They work great for my nursery and they look very elegant and high end (compare to pottery barn). I've got diapers, books, and glass/stainless steel bottles in them for storage until the baby is born, and even with all the weight of the items, these baskets have kept their shape and haven't gotten flimsy on me. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than I expected and the baskets came mis-shaped. More care in packaging would’ve prevented this. I needed larger floor baskets and these are definitely not floor worthy or worth what I paid. I’m giving it 3 stars because I was able to use them for toiletries under the sink even though originally they were going to be floor baskets, but they are so tiny they look silly on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Renell Farley

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting them to be so tiny, but that’s my mistake for not reading the sizes. Anyway, I used them to store diapers, bibs, and wash cloths near the changing table. Love the material and the color.
customer_reviews.author: Grecia Amparo-Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: So Adorable and really good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a baby shower gift to use as part of the presentation to wrap my gifts in. They went over really well and I think the new mom will be using them for her baby stuff. Very pretty and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Petree

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and quality items
customer_reviews.text: Very cute..very well made. Looks beautiful..very useful in organizing all of my little things that I need close (because I use them often..pill bottles..pens..notepads..coughdrops..etc.) It went from clutter to beautiful in 2 minutes. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: June Black

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and quality of these baskets. I used they to organize my son’s changing table. I used the larger one for diapers and the smaller ones for a tub of Boudreauxs Butt paste and thermometers in one and pee pee teepees/ washable wipes in the other one. I like them so much that I’m ordering a 2nd set of these baskets to organize his bathroom stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: lOvee
customer_reviews.text: great buy. very cute, great material and color. perfect for my little ones nursery.
customer_reviews.author: janette robledo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Bought them to put item in for a guest in the bedroom and bath
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Storage Containers
customer_reviews.text: I use them in my kitchen to put different items in. For example, I used one for my olive oils. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I use these all over the house. Very useful and aesthetically pleasing. I will likely buy another set since I've found so many ways to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Nursemom

customer_reviews.title: Cutersssss.
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Material is great!! I bought this honestly bc I thought they were cute.. shopaholic problems. Put my boyfriend PS4 crap in it. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Baan

customer_reviews.title: Durable baskets
customer_reviews.text: I love them! A little smaller than I thought, but that is fine. I dyed mine because I didn’t want them white. Quite durable but not stiff
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to take a chance in buying these baskets. However I was one of the unlucky people who received baskets with mold spots on them. They weren't big and I am not sure I would have noticed them if I had not read previous reviews. I am so happy I was aware this maybe an issue as I was using these for a baby gift. The baskets are otherwise beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good baskets!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I used larger size basket as diaper holder and little baskets for little baby accessories such as mittens, handkerchiefs, and socks. I might purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket.
customer_reviews.text: VERY well made, attractive, use it on top of toilet tank/back of toilet. Doesn’t hang off sides, doesn’t hang off front or back. The color doesn’t make the small bathroom look cluttered, so you get a good-looking basket for toilet paper, etc.
customer_reviews.author: MawMaw PawPaw Bowden in GA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: A Montessori blog I follow recommended these and so I bought them and they are great. They are the perfect size for my toddler to pick up and carry her toys. They are very well made. Would be perfect for things around the house too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful storage baskets!!
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with these baskets! Well made and just the sizes I needed. I live in a small home and keeping "uncluttered" is always a challenge! My rooms have light colours and lots of white...so I needed these to keep things neat.
customer_reviews.author: one silver bell

customer_reviews.title: The baskets are really pretty. They’re a good height for hold things and ...
customer_reviews.text: The baskets are really pretty. They’re a good height for hold things and the handles seem strong and well attached. I bought them for a gift and I’m happy with them. Can’t post a picture because I don’t want to show what I put in them for the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy baskets
customer_reviews.text: Love these baskets!! They are the perfect size for toys and they are very thick and sturdy. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Stenson

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft, sturdy baskets
customer_reviews.text: These baskets are fantastic! They are well made, hold their shape, and have no funny smell! These are very sturdy rope baskets that are true to size (read the description). We're using them to organize various video game controllers, though we did use similar baskets to organize doll clothes and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ivie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Baskets!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the basket set and I love them! Great price and quality. I have also received another basket and love it also. Their customer service is outstanding, should you have any issues!
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: The large basket is nice and clean and I am using it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: The large basket is nice and clean and I am using it on my kitchen counter top to hold napkins. The smaller ones, I am using around the house to hold small items to stay more organized.
customer_reviews.author: Nifty Fifties

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby dresser as diaper holder etc. They look super adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Mar De Li Word

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nursery!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these baskets in the baby's nursery. They will look very sweet on the changing table holding diapers and lotions! Very nice quality, exactness what I had been looking for. Purchased larger size as well too his toys later!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these but I’m so glad I did! They are great quality and make my space look organized and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest baskets on planet earth! I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using for dog toy storage so I didn't want a basket that was too deep/too tall. This is perfect size for what I was looking for. The color is crisp white! Just as described! And they are softer than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: categ3893

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great baskets, wonderful price and excellent customer service. One basket arrived with the handles sewn on crooked, I contacted the company and a replacement basket was mailed right away. These are perfect for organizing items in my daughter's nursery. They are bright white and very soft but still structured to retain shape and stand straight. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Clemente

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Work great for organizing my breastfeeding supplies around the house. Very durable for the price!
customer_reviews.author: EliseHall92

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these baskets but warning they are small. Not what I expected because I thought they were bigger looking at the picture. Until arrival and I was shocked. But on the other hand they are pretty and sturdy. I use them for my changing table. Alittle too pricey for the size but nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good baskets
customer_reviews.text: They are not tall enough to hide deodorant, but they hide my pack of cotton swabs and balls.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, because there are three sizes, so it is easy to pack and looks neat. I used to sort out the baby items, very good!
customer_reviews.author: davidzn131

customer_reviews.title: Great baskets!
customer_reviews.text: Love these baskets! Use them to hold my daughters toys and diapers downstairs. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Wedding gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a wedding gift with great feedback from bride. instantly put to use for many things already. They were sturdy and well made. Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ohman

customer_reviews.title: Handles are smushed in/down; has been over a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Handles are smushed in/down; has been over a month and still have not straightened out. I personally do not mind but could how this could bother others.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful well made baskets
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful well made baskets. I use two of them for the top of my closet to keep mittens and stuffed animals. I use the 3rd on in my kitchen to hold my keys and wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are soft and pretty and hold up to my toddler regularly crushing them
customer_reviews.author: Megan F.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage baskets!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for nursery! I keep her socks and bows in these!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie R

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: well made and sturdy, holds it's shape, am using the small ones for napkin holders and the large one for small toy blocks
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Must have in your nursery!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks in my nursery on my dresser and fits lots of things which I use on a day-to-day basis. And of course, the fact that it's cotton and free of any chemicals that other plastic organizers might have, makes it must have in your child's nursery!
customer_reviews.author: NuViper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect -
customer_reviews.text: These baskets are perfect! Very strong and sturdy! Using the baskets to separate makeup etc

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and nice size for organizing my vanity
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and the perfect size for my hair dryer in the large one, and brushes, moisturizer bottles, etc. in the two smaller ones. Makes my vanity neat and organized.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but the handles came distorted and don’t stick straight up as pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful!! Well made, nicely packaged, came perfectly shaped. Buying more!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ivory Baskets
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice baskets but they turned out to be more ivory than white in color.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my nursery! Yes they are smaller sizes, but will fit perfectly in the bookcase.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful baskets!
customer_reviews.text: I love these baskets - they are beautiful and a nice size.

customer_reviews.text: Thought for the price of three these would be much much bigger. They’re miniature and not worth the price major let down.

customer_reviews.title: but really nice quality. Bought for my grandsons nursery
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but really nice quality. Bought for my grandsons nursery. My daughter uses them all, and probably could have found use for another set. Color is perfect, neutral and will match any décor. Well made. Perfect for the nursery.

product_meta.title: Woven Basket Set of 3 - Storage Cotton Rope Baskets, Small Baby White Organizer Bin for Nursery Laundry Kids Toy
feature_bullets: ★【White & Pack 3】The Natural baskets with white color perfectly keep your nursery organized. Those same series bins double as the storage for makeup, office supplies, room, bath and the art decors.
★【100% Cotton Rope】The soft pure cotton rope makes the containers durable. Wonderful softness and without any chemicals, they are safe for baby, kid’s skin, and the wooden floor while moving.

★【Size & Kid’s Gift】12.5 x 8.5 x 5.2in (L x W x H) for the Large ; 6.8 x 6.0 x 5.0in (L x W x H) for other 2 boxes. Ideal gift for kid’s toy, candy, book, stationery, clothing store and the baby nursery.
★【Sturdy Handles& Washable】Solid enough to maintain its shape whilst the basket can bear the heavy duty. Handles are convenient for moving and he healthy cotton makes them easy to wash and clean.
★【100% Satisfaction 】 We provide full refunds and returns for any defects upon receiving the product.
